body.p: Boyd County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of William Lampton and Patsy Schooler Lampton. Married to Susannah Ryan Lampton in Bourbon, Kentucky on June 19, 1809. Father of John B. Lampton, William Henry Lampton, Robert W. Lampton, Polly Lampton, and Susan Ann Lampton Womack. Owned seven enslaved people in Greenup County in 1830. Appointed postmaster in Greenup County on February 15, 1837. Manufacturer in Carter County in 1850. Farmer in Greenup County in 1860.
